## About page

The Meshinchi and Locatelli Lab Group documentation for creating, maintaining, and contributing to the Meshinchi and Locatelli Lab's software and data analysis pipelines on github.
:::

<h3 align="center">

Welcome to the Meshinchi Lab at Fred Hutch.

</h3>

Our research laboratory is studying genomic expression of acute myeloid leukemia-restricted targets on the cell surface that are ideal for immunotherapeutic targeting with chimeric antigen receptor T-cell (CAR T) therapies, as well as identifying and validating target genes for further immunotherapy development.

Currently, [Soheil Meshinchi, M.D., Ph.D.,](http://meshinchilab.com/) working in collaboration with [Franco Locatelli, M.D., Ph.D.](https://www.ospedalebambinogesu.it/area-di-ricerca---oncoematologia-94851/) and [Concetta Quintarelli, M.D., Ph.D.](https://www.ospedalebambinogesu.it/terapia-genica-dei-tumori-95043/) at the [Bambino Gesù Children's Hospital IRCCS](https://www.ospedalebambinogesu.it/ricerca/) in Rome, Italy, we are investigating the potential of CAR T-cell therapy in pediatric acute myeloid leukemia (AML) and T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (T-ALL) patients.
